author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What is Adam Savage's advice on getting through these uncertain and hostile times? Would he change anything about his past? What does Adam mean by "scarcity model?" When is something gatekeeping and when is it asking people to pay their dues? In this live stream excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members Gwen Protheroe, Vickie Bligh, William Castille and Jeremy Dellarosa, whom we thank for their support. How are YOU managing in today's world?

Empathy, Kindness, Respect T: https://cottonbureau.com/p/2EUGSH/shirt/empathy-kindness-respect#
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:

00:00 Empathy, kindness, respect
03:05 Changing the past
03:40 Scarcity Model
06:05 Gatekeeping

title: Adam Savage's Thoughts on Empathy, Kindness and Respect

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:

title: WEIRDEST Place #AdamSavage's Ever Been?
